title: Lore Q: The Shadow Order
body: Where in Ionia is Zed's Shadow Order? Do they operate out of a monastery or do they have their own base somewhere? I think I read somewhere they overtook the KinKou Monastery after Kusho's death? Was curious, I love the lore of Runeterra and wanted to know more about Ionia.

replies.body: The Order of Shadow did indeed take over the Kinkou monastery, after Zed drove them out. That is most definitely not their only base of operations, though.
But The Order kept the monastery's original name for reasons...
There's a little wooden sign by the front gate that says "under new management."
Zed still gets Kusho's mail. It's driving him crazy.
Umm, it's not actually CALLED 'The Kinkou Monastery'... that's more of a description.
Ugh forgive me. When its only ever been referred to and known as 'Kinkou Monastery', so one would tend to conclude that IS its actual name.
So where is Shen then? Are the Kinkou in full nomad mode?
